name: Simple Tag Manager
author: Daniel Sedmak

sections.description:
Simple Tag Manager is a simple plugin created in order to easily install Google Tag Manager and Google Analytics in your WordPress website.
Just copy and paste the property code or the tracking ID and … it’s done!
sections.installation:
Installing this plugin is very simple:

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Settings->Simple Tag Manager screen to configure the plugin
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

Installing this plugin is very simple:

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Settings->Simple Tag Manager screen to configure the plugin

Why isn’t the output displaying correctly?

Two possibilities: First, you haven’t yet specified the ID in the admin panel, or second, your theme is missing a call.
sections.changelog:
1.2

  • Added support to automatic tracking code

1.1

  • Using Bootstrap to style the settings page
  • Added support to translations
  • Added support for Google Analytics and Custom Codes

1.0

  • The first version of Simple Tag Manager
